hero_section.title: Welcome to Aarush International Education Limited
hero_section.subtitle: Your Gateway to Global Education

about_us_section.title: About Us
about_us_section.description: Aarush International Education Limited is a leading educational consultancy dedicated to helping students achieve their dreams of studying abroad.

services.name: Study Abroad Programs
services.description: Comprehensive assistance with selecting study destinations, courses, and application processes.

services.name: Visa Assistance
services.description: Expert guidance on visa requirements, application procedures, and documentation.

services.name: Test Preparation
services.description: Effective preparation courses for exams like TOEFL, IELTS, SAT, GRE, and GMAT.

services.name: Counseling Services
services.description: Personalized counseling services for students and parents, helping them make informed decisions.

services.name: Career Guidance
services.description: Assistance in selecting the right educational path and institution based on individual aspirations and goals.

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.quote: Thanks to Aarush International, I was able to fulfill my dream of studying abroad. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Emily Johnson
testimonials.quote: The visa assistance provided by Aarush International was invaluable. They made the process seamless and stress-free.
